did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Notes for Central New York Chapter tour, Cortland, N.Y., 1976.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Society of Architectural Historians. Central New York Chapter.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: 31 page loose-leaf brochure entitled "The New 'GRIP'S' Historical Souvenir of Cortland," tour notes for "Wagons, Corsets, and Woven Wire, Architecture in Cortland, 1880-1910," prepared by Kevin and Elaine Harrington for the Central New York Chapter of the Society of Architectural Historians, December 23, 1976.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: 31 page loose-leaf brochure entitled "The New 'GRIP'S' Historical Souvenir of Cortland," tour notes for "Wagons, Corsets, and Woven Wire, Architecture in Cortland, 1880-1910," prepared by Kevin and Elaine Harrington for the Central New York Chapter of the Society of Architectural Historians, December 23, 1976.
